lead_paragraph: The owners of the ShopRite L.P.G.A. Classic yesterday folded the 21-year-old event in the shadows of the Atlantic City casino resorts, criticizing the L.P.G.A. Tour for taking away their traditional date in early June and then failing to negotiate a workable replacement. The L.P.G.A. said that the tournament’s statement was “full of falsehoods and incorrect accounts.” The tournament was played this year at the Seaview Resort and Spa course in Galloway Township.
